task.description: Add capability to inject custom CSS into pages before PDF generation. This allows users to override styles specifically for printing, such as hiding navigation, adjusting layouts, or applying print-specific styles.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Works with both HTML and URL sources
Integration tests validate CSS is applied

implementation-notes.note: Add method to PdfGenerator builder: .withCustomCss(String css) .withCustomCssFromFile(Path cssFile)
Inject CSS after page load, before PDF generation

testing-requirements.requirement: Integration test with custom CSS that hides an element
Integration test with CSS from file
Verify injected CSS is present in generated PDF
